# **![][image1]**

**Connect Me**                                      
**Tutor FAQs**

* This doc answers the most common tutor questions  
* Start here before contacting a board member  
* Use **⌘ \+ F (Mac) or Ctrl \+ F (Windows)** to search for keywords to quickly find answers

---

# **Accessing & Viewing Information**

# **How do I join the Connect Me Portal?**

You will receive a sign up email from Connect Me **within 2-3 days of joining the Discord**. After that time period, if you have not received a sign up link, please DM Yulianna (.yuli\_0) so we can resend the link.

# **How do I utilize the Connect Me Portal?**

Please use this manual to learn how to navigate the portal: [Connect Me Portal Manual](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Tzc0JA90Ghy76UdBPCRFrUcT27jOxTvqh4yxq1_xVXY/edit?usp=sharing)

# **How can I view my hours?**

1. Login to the tutor portal  
2. Press "My Hours" on the left-hand sidebar 

# **How can I view my zoom link for a specific session?**

1. Login to the tutor portal  
2. On your dashboard, your session with the student should be viewable. Click the **“view”** button. If you're unsure, make sure to ask the member that paired you with the student.

# **Where can I find the Connect Me Handbook?**

It is pinned on the [**\#announcements**](https://discord.com/channels/823312187069169736/823329306263683103) channel on Discord

# **Biweekly Meetings**

# **Am I required to attend a biweekly even if I'm paused for the summer?**

Yes, attendance is mandatory for biweekly's even over the summer\! Please stay engaged by attending when you can. If you can't attend, please fill out the [Biweekly Excused Absence form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSffBL3yqQA3B89C2MFO8Q7I-OXLtb5aaz4wpJIkGUcXKp1hIw/viewform?usp=pp_url).

# **What do I do if I miss a biweekly meeting?**

You are allowed up to **3 unexcused absences** for biweekly meetings. If you miss a meeting, contact a board member for the check-in form. **Note:** If you did not submit the absence form beforehand, your absence will still be marked as unexcused.

# **What do I do if I can't make it to a biweekly meeting？**

Fill out [this form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSffBL3yqQA3B89C2MFO8Q7I-OXLtb5aaz4wpJIkGUcXKp1hIw/viewform) **at least 24 hours** before the bi-weekly. If it is an emergency or unexpected circumstance, please contact Diksha Lal.

# **Tutoring Sessions**

# **What do I do if I'm waiting in a session and my student doesn't show up?**

**Follow the 4-Step Protocol:** 

1. If the student doesn't join 5 minutes after the start of the session, call the parent. If the parent does not pick up, leave a voicemail.  
2. After calling, text the parent. If you do not get a response within 10 minutes, you may leave. If you get a response from the parent that they will join, you must rejoin the zoom and tutor until the end of session.  
3. After a day, if the parent has not responded to call or text, email them asking if the student will join the next session.  
4. If the parent hasn't responded after a few days, DM Yulianna Kowalczyk for assistance.  
   

You must still fill out the Session Exit Form on your portal and select the correct option.

# **What do I do if another tutor joins my zoom link while I have a meeting scheduled with that link?**

1. Find another available zoom link by pressing the reschedule button and selecting a different zoom link for that time

# **My student hasn't responded or joined our sessions. What should I do?**

Contact either an Admissions or Operations member to let them know. Once they confirm and have read your message, please remove the session from your portal.

# **How can I reschedule/cancel a session?**

Please look at the [Connect Me Tutor Portal Manual](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Tzc0JA90Ghy76UdBPCRFrUcT27jOxTvqh4yxq1_xVXY/edit?usp=sharing) on how to complete this.

# **What do I do if I need to change my session time permanently?**

Please look at the [Connect Me Tutor Portal Manual](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Tzc0JA90Ghy76UdBPCRFrUcT27jOxTvqh4yxq1_xVXY/edit?usp=sharing) on how to complete this.

# **How do I know the specific topics my student needs tutoring in?**

When you reach out to the parent to introduce yourself, ask them what topics they would like covered or how they prefer the tutoring sessions to be structured (completing homework, studying for tests, learning new content). Once you know the specific structure, you can use Connect Me worksheets or have the parent send you pictures of the homework ahead of the sessions.

# **What should I do if I am unable to tutor a student anymore?**

1. Email the parent professionally to inform them that you are no longer available to tutor due to other commitments. Let them know a Connect Me member will contact them about a new tutor, and that they do not need to sign their student up again.  
   1. **Please Cc this email:** [ykowalczyk@connectmego.org](mailto:ykowalczyk@connectmego.org)   
2. Reach out to Yulianna Kowalczyk, Claudia Wang, or Addison Duong, so they can find a new tutor for your student.

# **What should I do if my student's parent would like to give feedback on services or in general?**

You can send the parent this link to provide their testimony/feedback: [https://forms.gle/dXkHMpgryhKKW6Zn8](https://forms.gle/dXkHMpgryhKKW6Zn8)

# **What do I do if I need to take a break from tutoring?**

We allow tutors to pause tutoring for a **maximum of 3 months,** but you must attend biweekly meetings. Please message Yulianna on Discord to request taking a break.

# 

# **Validating Hours**

# **I need a signature to validate my hours. What should I do?**

Please email [ykowalcz@connectmego.org](mailto:ykowalcz@connectmego.org) or DM on Discord a pdf (filled out with the amount of hours completed) to Yulianna

# **I need an email to validate my hours. What should I use?**

Please put the email as ykowalczyk@connectmego.org

# **Leadership Applications**

# **How can I apply for a leadership position?**

You can submit your application for Connect Me Leadership with this [Application Form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1at-8yFnBScvV0jGM7K7FBmpOxW1mIBO4ajsPoV4pzbM/viewform?edit_requested=true).

# **What do the different leadership departments do?**

Visit our website on the section about [Connect Me's departments](https://connectmego.org/connect-me-departments/) and to learn about them as well as who is in them\! Please also take a look at [Connect Me Departments](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1UURG9FmN69xFl-QdxMd5qpIAf15MmlYK3h1dQQ-uWXU/edit?tab=t.0).

# **What are the requirements to join leadership?**

You need to have **at least 3 successful sessions** OR have a parent leave a 5-star **Google review**

# **General Support & Concerns**

# **How can I join the subhotline?**

In the **role-select channel** on Discord, click the **red dot** for the Subhotline. This will open the subhotline channel, where messages about needed subs (date, grade, time) will appear. Respond to a message to volunteer, and you’ll be contacted with more details.

# **If I would like to stop tutoring, how early of a notice do I need to give?**

Please reach out to an Admissions member **at least 2 weeks** prior so we have enough time to find another tutor\!

# **What if I have a concern or issue to report?**

1. Report any concerns using this google form: [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1DX7bSjiqPp108gesN0VsaJzLb3VsKs\_NZktF\_hfEb0Q/edit](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1DX7bSjiqPp108gesN0VsaJzLb3VsKs_NZktF_hfEb0Q/edit)   
     
2. Please contact a board member immediately in the event of an emergency or inappropriate behavior.
